articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week the Leafly Explorer gained four new varieties recommended to us by you fine folks (keep 'em coming!). Alaskan Ice from Green House Seeds is a finnicky grow, but this sativa's intense euphoria is well worth the challenge in the garden. Our new indica strain from the southern Chinese province of Yunnan is a go-to medicine for aches, pains, and bad moods. Dream Berry, another elite strain from Apothecary Genetics, puts an indica spin on fan-favorite Blue Dream by adding Blueberry to the mix. Last but not least, we added two high-CBD strains, Harle-Tsu and Zen, which have worked wonders for patients treating pain, inflammation, and digestive issues.
Are these strains old news to you? If the experience was unforgettable, be sure to leave a review for the ones you've tried!
   1. Alaskan Ice
Characteristics of Alaskan Ice:

70% sativa
Cross between White Widow and Haze
Breeder: Green House Seeds
Sour, spicy aroma
Euphoric with intoxicating potency
Indoor flowering time of 9 weeks

   2. China Yunnan
Characteristics of China Yunnan:

80% indica
Unknown indica crossed with a South Asian sativa
Breeder: ACE Seeds
Sweet, woody aroma
Brings happy effects, sensory elevation, and full-body calm
Good for treating pain, sleeplessness, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   3. Dream Berry
Characteristics of Dream Berry:

Mostly indica strain
Cross between Blue Dream and Blackberry
Breeder: Apothecary Genetics
Sweet, berry aroma
Delivers calming indica qualities
Indoor flowering time of 6 to 7 weeks

   4. Harle-Tsu
Characteristics of Harle-Tsu:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Harlequin and Sour Tsunami
Breeder: Southern Humbolt Seed Collective
Has high-CBD content and little to no psychoactivity
Good for pain and inflammation relief
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks

   5. Zen
Characteristics of Zen:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Mexican Sativa, Afghani, and Lavender
Breeder: CBD Seeds
Balances THC and CBD contents
Earthy, berry aroma
Good for treating appetite loss, nausea, anorexia, Crohn's disease, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 10 weeks
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Alaskan Ice, China Yunnan, Dream Berry, Harle-Tsu, and Zen

description: Alaskan Ice by Green House Seeds is a powerful sativa that crosses a euphoric White Widow hybrid with the energizing buzz of Haze. Frostlike resin blankets the buds in a promise of soaring psychoactivity, anchored only by its moderate CBD content. The intensity of this 70% sativa strain is recommended for evening consumption and unproductive weekends. Alaskan Ice is a slight variant of Moby Dick, but poses a greater challenge to growers; cultivators with the expertise to raise Alaskan Ice will be rewarded with a highly potent harvest of sour, spicy buds following a 9 week flowering period. The high resin content of Alaskan Ice has made this strain a favorite among hash producers and patients with severe symptoms.
descriptionPlain: Alaskan Ice by Green House Seeds is a powerful sativa that crosses a euphoric White Widow hybrid with the energizing buzz of Haze. Frostlike resin blankets the buds in a promise of soaring psychoactivity, anchored only by its moderate CBD content. The intensity of this 70% sativa strain is recommended for evening consumption and unproductive weekends. Alaskan Ice is a slight variant of Moby Dick, but poses a greater challenge to growers; cultivators with the expertise to raise Alaskan Ice will be rewarded with a highly potent harvest of sour, spicy buds following a 9 week flowering period. The high resin content of Alaskan Ice has made this strain a favorite among hash producers and patients with severe symptoms.

highlightedReviews.text: One of those strains that are so potent you can go to sleep for 8 hours and still feel buzzed when you wake up. Absolutely great for daytime use. Very little anxiety and it gave me the giggles with a grin that just wouldn't go away. In higher doses it rushes behind your eyes and gives a feeling of bliss and euphoria with an almost numbing body high but still very functional. Also it seemed very good for social events. It cleared my mind, like the flood gates for deep conversations. highly recommended!

Alaskan Ice is an awesome sativa! It delivers a great euphoric, and energizing head-high. I really enjoyed it while out in nature! I felt a lot of positive introspection, and improved mood. It came in huge nugs, that where frosted in trichomes. It has a very pungent aroma too, that's kind of earthy with menthol. If I see it, I'll get again for sure!

name: Alaskan Ice
